text: ane yahudi'o mate ame dareka nakhavala janavara harama kari didha hata, gaya ane bakari, te banneni carabi harama kari didhi hati, parantu (te carabi) je te'oni pitha ane antarada para hoya, athava je hadaka sathe hoya (te halala kari), te'ona vidrohana karane ame te'one a saja api ane ame kharekhara saca che
